str2: (a) of two: another, a second, (b) other, different, (c) one's neighbor. Of uncertain affinity; other or different.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.
Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: See! Lo! Behold! Look! Second person singular imperative middle voice of eido; used as imperative lo!

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
A mina, a Greek monetary unit equal to 100 drachma. Of Latin origin; a mna, a certain weight.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Accusative Feminine Singular
Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
A handkerchief, napkin. Of Latin origin; a sudarium, i.e. Towel.
